name: Omae Wa Mou Shindeiru
description: Omae Wa Mou Shindeiru - The game requires you not to allow evil spirits to get to you. Kill him quickly and ruthlessly. In the game you need to press certain keys of the keyboard to cause damage to the enemy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 75 MB available space
